mapper.select: select t1.id as id, userId, awardId, t2.imgUrl as imgUrl, awardCount, date_format(str_to_date(givenTime, '%Y%m%d%H%I%S'), '%Y-%m-%d') as day, status, if (t2.nickName is null, t2.phone, t2.nickName) as name from lotteryMigrateInfoMsg t1 join usersAccount t2 on (t1.userId=t2.id) where t1.toUserId=#{userId} order by t1.id desc limit #{start}, 5
mapper.insert: insert into lotteryMigrateInfoMsg(userId, toUserId, awardId, awardCount, givenTime, status) values(#{userId}, #{toUserId}, #{awardId}, #{awardCount}, #{givenTime}, 'UN_RECV')
mapper.update: update lotteryMigrateInfoMsg set status='RECV' where id=#{givenId}
mapper.select: select toUserId, awardId, awardCount from lotteryMigrateInfoMsg where id=#{givenId}
select id as userId, nickName as name, phone, imgUrl from usersAccount where id=#{userId}
select userId, familyId from userFamilyRelation where familyId in (select familyId from userFamilyRelation where userId=#{userId} group by familyId) and userId!=#{userId} order by userId asc
select count(1) from familyInfo where createUserId=#{userId} and id=#{familyId}
select role from userFamilyRelation where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId}
